name: XCTNSNotificationExpectation
desc: An expectation that is fulfilled when an expected NSNotification is received.

items.name: init(name: NSNotification.Name)
items.desc: Creates an expectation that is fulfilled when an NSNotification is posted from the default notification center by any object.

items.name: init(name: NSNotification.Name, object: Any?)
items.desc: Creates an expectation that is fulfilled when an NSNotification is posted from the default notification center by a specific object.

items.name: init(name: NSNotification.Name, object: Any?, notificationCenter: NotificationCenter)
items.desc: Creates an expectation that is fulfilled when an NSNotification is posted from a specific notification center, optionally by a specific object.

items.name: var notificationName: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: The name of the notification that the expectation is waiting for.

items.name: var observedObject: Any?
items.desc: The object by which the notification must be posted, or nil if the notification can be posted by any object.

items.name: var notificationCenter: NotificationCenter
items.desc: The notification center from which the notification must be posted.

items.name: var handler: XCTNSNotificationExpectation.Handler?
items.desc: An optional handler that performs custom evaluation of matching notifications.

items.name: typealias XCTNSNotificationExpectation.Handler
items.desc: A custom handler to be called when a matching notification is received.
